description
Feel like Ken from Street Fighter IV with this alternate set of gloves! No martial artist is complete without them! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Ken de Street Fighter IV avec ce bas de kimono alternatif. Combinez-le avec le haut et devenez le combattant ultime ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesen alternativen Handschuhen wie Ken aus Street Fighter IV! Ein absolutes Muss für jeden Martial-Arts-Kämpfer! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Ken di Street Fighter IV con questi guanti! Nessun lottatore può farne a meno! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte estos guantes alternativo y siéntete como Ken de Street Fighter IV! ¡No tendrás rival! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ケンになりきることができるグローブのアレンジ ver.！ 格闘家にかかせない一品 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 켄이 되는 글러브 어렌지 ver.！ 격투가에게는 없어서 안 되는 물건. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Ken from Street Fighter IV with this alternate set of gloves! No martial artist is complete without them! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
